items.content_html: ContactSync is a lightweight mobile app designed to help small businesses easily manage and synchronize their contacts. By providing a straightforward interface and efficient contact management, ContactSync aims to simplify your workflow.

items.content_html: A lightweight, fastest and efficient GitHub Action built with TypeScript + Micromatch to filter file changes in a Pull Request (PR). This action allows you to detect changes in code, documentation, or specific directories, helping you trigger conditional CI/CD workflows.
items.title: JagjeevanAK/path-filter: A lightweight, fastest and efficient GitHub Action built with TypeScript + Micromatch to filter file changes in a Pull Request (PR).  This action allows you to detect changes in code, documentation, or specific directories, helping you trigger conditional CI/CD workflows.

items.content_html: QR_Code Generator built with React allows users to easily create custom QR codes. Simply input text or a URL, and the app generates a scannable QR code in real-time. It’s lightweight, responsive, and user-friendly, providing a seamless experience across devices for quick and efficient QR code generation.
items.title: ak-dev-mern/QR_Code-Generator-React: QR_Code Generator built with React allows users to easily create custom QR codes. Simply input text or a URL, and the app generates a scannable QR code in real-time. It’s lightweight, responsive, and user-friendly, providing a seamless experience across devices for quick and efficient QR code generation.
